com.datastax.driver.mapping

Class MappedClassesOnlyHierarchyScanStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datastax.driver.mapping.MappedClassesOnlyHierarchyScanStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HierarchyScanStrategy

    public class MappedClassesOnlyHierarchyScanStrategy
extends Object
implements HierarchyScanStrategy
    A HierarchyScanStrategy that excludes all ancestors of mapped classes, thus restricting class scan to the mapped classes themselves.

    This strategy can be used instead of DefaultHierarchyScanStrategy to achieve pre-JAVA-541 behavior.

    • Method Detail

      • filterClassHierarchy

        public List<Class<?>> filterClassHierarchy(Class<?> mappedClass)
        Description copied from interface: HierarchyScanStrategy
        Computes the ancestors of the given base class, optionally filtering out any ancestor that should not be scanned.

        Implementors should always include mappedClass in the returned list.

        Specified by:
        filterClassHierarchy in interface HierarchyScanStrategy
        Parameters:
        mappedClass - The mapped class; this is necessarily a class annotated with either @Table or @UDT.
        Returns:
        the list of classes that should be scanned, including mappedClass itself and its ancestors, ordered from the lowest (closest to mappedClass) to the highest (or farthest from mappedClass).
